titles.title: A resolution designating July 24, 2014, as "International Self-Care Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/23/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates July 24, 2014, as International Self-Care Day and recognizes the importance of improving awareness of self-care and the value self-care represents for the people of the United States.
